11.content: Ah the Ice queen herself... deliciously sexy, and willing to put her feet to good use crushing everything in sight... but which incarnation?
11.title: Shiva

choices: Force you to worship my feet
Slowly break your body beneath me
Grow even larger and crush the nearby town
114.content:
Well... THIS is a fine mess you've gotten yourself into...

After playing a certain video game (Final Fantasy 10) and using a certain summon (Shiva) for the first time, you immediately felt yourself drawn to her. her curves, her strong legs, her almost flirtatious method of combat. You wished, OH you wished that she was real. And enormous, so there could be more of her to enjoy!

Well... bad choice. After shutting off the game for the night, you turned to head to your room... only to realize that the summon of your dreams was directly behind you, with an evil smirk on her face.

"So... You are the one who has called me, eh...?" She spoke, her head leaning down and a sexy finger tracing under your jaw and tilting your head up. "And such an... odd desire... you want me to be enormous...? Well then... FINE!" She suddenly shouts, her arm raised in a casting position.

Diving for cover, you see her body impaled multiple times by ice strikes... but despite that, she seemed to feel nothing... in fact... she was using the ice energy to grow!

Her head touched the fifteen foot high ceiling(You lived in a big house) and the ice ceased to form, allowing her to smirk down at your quivering form. "Hmmm... perhaps the summoner should serve the summon...? Perhaps I should..."
114.title: Final Fantasy 10

choices: Teach her how to have fun on Earth
Give her people you don't like as torture toys!
1142.content:
So saying, she plants a foot on your body and slowly starts to press down. At first all you feel is sheer cold from the contact with the ice entity, but soon enough the pressure starts to get painful. Bones groan and creak as she puts more weight on her foot, causing her evil smirk to grow.

"W-wait! Stop!"

At first she ignores you and simply watches you futily struggle to escape. But just as you feel your ribcage about to give way she finally stops.

"And why should I, little summoner?"

She asked, looking down on you as though you're nothing but a lowly insect, destined to end it's life smashed into a paste under her foot. You speak quickly while you still have the chance.

"B-because, w-what good am I to you if you crush me to death?"

You manage to wheeze out. Shiva considers this.

"Hm. Excellent point."

The icy beauty gazes down at you thoughtfully, making you shiver. And not JUST from the ice cold foot mashing you into the floor. Wiggling her toes slightly, drumming the clawed digits against you, she grins again.

"But what will you offer me in exchange for sparing you, little summoner?"

That's a tough one. What will you give?
1142.title: Slowly break your body beneath me

choices: Stomp on you as a stress relief and bring you back
Torture you underfoot and the Auto-life is a safety measure
11421.content:
"My... my life."

Shiva raised an eyebrow, her ice cold foot shifting so that she could see your head in between her big and second toe. "Excuse me...?"

"I'll... I'll give you my life... in exchange for sparing me. I'll be yours... forever." As soon as you spoke those words, Shiva threw back her head and laughed.

"Oh, so the high and mighty human is reduced to a begging fool at a momentary glimpse of true power... Fine, slave... I will let you serve me." She clicks her fingers, surrounding your body in a golden light... though, given your knowledge, you know exactly what this is. An evil grin from the ice goddess confirms it.

She's just cast auto-life on you... which means she's planning to...
11421.title: Become her servant

choices: Force you to worship her massive feet
Calls in a friend: Ifrit (Big fiery demon) or Bahamut (Big dragon) Your choice
114211.content:
"Do you know what I have just done, human...?" The ice titaness asked, stroking you under her cold blue sole. "I have put a spell on you, that you humans know as Auto-Life... It will revive you if ever you should... meet your untimely end." Her grin turns psychotic. "I have had enough of serving under you humans... Now you... shall SERVE UNDER US!" She shouts, slamming her foot down on you with every capitalized word, smashing bones into powder and causing organs to burst out of your body, splattering the floor, and her sole, with blood.

Shiva removed her foot from your corpse, sighing a bit as she calmed down. Clicking her fingers, she cleaned up her sole and your body, restoring you to life knelt at her feet. "Now, my little servant..." She wiggled her toes. "Perhaps you should worship my feet, since that's all you're good for. Or... Ooooh... perhaps I should call the others to torture you... hmmmm..."

What does she do to prolong your torment?
114211.title: Stomp on you as a stress relief and bring you back

choices: Shiva picks up the pace even more and runs on you
She thinks of a new way to make you suffer under her feet
114212.content:
Smirking darkly, Shiva presses down on you till your bones are on the verge of collapsing from the pressure, then she abruptly stops and takes her foot off you, watching you wheeze and gasp in amusement.

"That was nothing, little worm. The fun is just starting.

She steps on your lower body and raises her other foot in the air, making you cry out.

"Ah!! My legs!!"

Your cries are quickly silenced as her foot slams down on your upper body. She stands there on you for a moment, letting you suffer under her giant weight. Then Shiva begins to march in place, alternately stomping your upper and lower body. Her march picks up to a jog, pummeling and crushing you underfoot, only for the auto-life to bring you back again and again.
114212.title: Torture you underfoot and the Auto-life is a sa...

1142122.content:
"Hmmm... fun as this is... I always did enjoy something a little more..." She intentionally leaves the sentence unfinished as she steps off of you broken body, the spell she cast still going strong to keep you alive. She bent down to savor your reaction when she told you that she would like something more...

"Breathtaking." Your eyes widen as she gives off a seductive chuckle, then steps forward, her godly foot landing on your face and cutting off your air supply. With another twitch of her toes, she creates restraints out of ice that pinned you to the floor to minimize thrashing.

"Or maybe perhaps... I should crush that weak little throat of yours, insect..." She lifts her foot off of your face in order to gently stroke your throat with her toes.

"Decisions... decisions..."

info.brief_description: I see a lot of FF stories based around the humans... but why not the summons?
info.description:
I see a lot of FF stories based around the humans... but why not the summons? Story can be done in either 'you' or in the summon of choice's perspective.

1. It's only the main character, and whatever summon you pick, though you can have a couple of them double team him

2. Try to avoid killing off the main character, but if you're feeling particularly evil, go ahead.

3. If you want to have them tear up a city, don't skimp on the details. :) Then you can kill as many people as you want.

4. Spell check is mandatory.

5. Have fun, do whatever... but no piss/poop, please.
